h1_title: How to Unlock the Zodiac Village and Upgrade Armor
content: Interacting with Xu Dog in the Painted Realm now offers the option to Request Medicine. Each time you do this, Xu Dog will provide you with potions.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Zodiac_Village_and_Upgrade_Armor.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Zodiac Village and Upgrade Armor', specifically from the subsection 'Request Medicines from Xu Dog'.
The content is as follows:
Interacting with Xu Dog in the Painted Realm now offers the option to Request Medicine. Each time you do this, Xu Dog will provide you with potions.
